name: mumlers_app_p2p
description: a spirit infused p2p videochat savouring the distance and tech that collapses it

scripts.start_prod: browserify index.js -o ./public/bundle.js & env-cmd -f .env.google pm2 start app.js --node-args='schedule'
scripts.start_local: browserify index.js -o ./public/bundle.js; browserify schedule_src/schedule_f.js -o ./public/scripts/schedule_f.js & env-cmd -f .env.google pm2 start app_local.js --time -- schedule
scripts.start_local_dev_schedule: browserify index.js -o ./public/bundle.js; watchify schedule_src/schedule_f.js -o ./public/scripts/schedule_f.js & env-cmd -f .env.google node --inspect-brk app_local schedule

author: psinka
